channel.title: Resume after power loss
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm pretty sure this is a silly issue and I'm forgetting something. I have an Axoloti controlled via Midi with a BeatStep Pro (awesome!). Everything works fine, I can play tunes via the sequencer, control knobs in control mode, etc. All over midi. But when I take the Axoloti off USB from the laptop I programmed it with, and reconnect to a generic DC power source, it powers up, the light goes green, but I cannot get it to respond to the Beatstep anymore. What am I doing wrong here? (running 1.0.12 firmware on Win10 and Linux).
Tips suggestions anyone? Thanks!

item.title: Resume after power loss
item.dc:creator: @coert Coert van Gemeren
item.description:
@coert wrote:

Yes, that was it! Did not upload as startup. I thought it must have been something I overlooked. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Resume after power loss
item.dc:creator: @JeromeB
item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

Did you only use the "live" checkbox or did you upload your patch on the board with "Upload to SDCard as startup" ?

Read full topic
